name: European Candle Association
goal:
The European Candle Association is a federation of the leading European candle manufacturing companies. ECA´s member companies produce candles in 12 European countries and represent more than 50 % of the European candle production. The association represents its members´ interests especially in relation to the following topics:

- Maintenance, research and development with regards to safety, health and environmental protection

- Maintaining and increasing quality of candles

- Standardisation work

- Identification of new raw materials and development of new technologies
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Safety requirements or standardisation mandate for candles, candle base materials and accessories
